profile:
Welcome to Ecosparkle - Your Green Clean Team. We’re an independent, locally owned business based in Newmarket, Ontario – and a 6-year straight Reader’s Choice winner. We proudly offer sustainable, Eco-friendly, synthetic chemical-free natural and organic cleaning solutions to homes & businesses within the entire York Region and Greater Toronto Areas, including: Newmarket, Aurora, Bradford, East Gwillimbury, King City, Richmond Hill, Stoufville, Markham, Vaughan, Uxbridge, Oakville, Mississauga, North York, Etobicoke and Downtown Toronto. 
 
Request your free Green Clean Quote today!

profile:
Experience 5-star customer service done right. We provide our clients with the best professional and high-quality window cleaning, power washing, and gutter cleaning services. Our technicians will show up to your home or business ready to carry out your service call with professional equipment and tools.

Exterior window cleaning is done by top-notch carbon fiber, water-fed pole, specialized squeegee, and filtered water to ensure shine of the windows. Our interior window cleaning service is done by hand – we use the classic applicator and squeegee method. We can also clean skylights, solariums and screens to make your property shine.

profile:
Apex window cleaning has been servicing York Region since 2009! We are dedicated professionals that specialize in residential and commercial  interior/exterior window cleaning.  Providing our customers with a thorough service including tracks, screens, sills and frames. Using the most up to date techniques and high quality solutions for a satisfaction  guarantee.  With a strong focus to exceed your expectations our employees are polite, prompt and professionals in uniform. This small family owned business is built generally on a referral  basis and is continuously growing. Welcoming new customers each year.  Apex window cleaning is a reputable company with numerous clientele that stand behind them.  Year after year we strive to build our customer relations, in hopes to a have repetitive clients.  Due to our outstanding quality of work and creating enjoyable experiences using Apex Window cleaning.  Look no further with Apex window cleaning you will be treated with the utmost respect, service with a smile year after year. 

We also offer
> Eaves cleaning
 >Power washing, siding,patio, decks & more.
>Christmas light installations/take down on home & trees! 
>Interior/Exterior painting of home and decks

Take advantage of are yearly specials and deals, book your spring and fall packages together! Ask about are free offers and bundle packages. 
Referrals are always appreciated and can receive you discounts... just ask how!  
Happy with our service? Don't forget to add a review on Homestars.ca

During your consultation over phone or in person you will be provided with the step by step approach we take to complete each task and please feel free to ask any and all questions big or small. We are here for you as we take pride and stand behind are work. *please note an estimate can only be give once on premises 

Call or Email today! for a free home consultation provided with a competitive estimate for any of these home care needs Windows, eaves, power washing, Christmas light installation & interior exterior painting. 

Looking for more!  Apex Window Cleaning is affiliated with CitytoCityclean residential/commercial Cleaning Service www.citytocityclean.com 

"Brighten your day and the look of your home             with Apex Windows"
